verses.verse: <S%H3254>Again<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H5496>moved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> against <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H4487>number<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2428>army,<s%> who was with <S%H7751>him,<s%> "Now go back and forth through all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and <S%H6485>number<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4557>sum<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

<S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Now may <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3254>add<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> however many they may <S%H1992>be,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5869>times;<s%> and may the eyes of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H113>it.<s%> But why does my lord the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in this <S%H1697>thing?<s%>"

<S%H4428>Notwithstanding,<s%> the king's <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> against <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and against the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>army.<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> to <S%H6485>number<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to <S%H3270>Jazer:<s%>

then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and to the <S%H776>land<s%> of Tahtim <S%H8483>Hodshi;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to Dan <S%H1842>Jaan,<s%> and <S%H5439>around<s%> to <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%>

and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4013>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and to all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and of the <S%H3669>Canaanites;<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

So when they had <S%H7751>gone<s%> back and forth through all the <S%H776>land,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H3097>Joab<s%> gave <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4557>sum<s%> of the <S%H4662>numbering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H4428>king:<s%> and there were in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H8025>drew<s%> the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> him <S%H310>after<s%> that he had <S%H5608>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in that which I have <S%H6213>done.<s%> But <S%H3068>now,<s%> Yahweh, put <S%H5674>away,<s%> I beg <S%H5771>you,<s%> the iniquity of your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for I have done <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5528>foolishly.<s%>"

When <S%H1732>David<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H2374>seer,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I <S%H5190>offer<s%> you <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H977>things.<s%> Choose <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H6213>them,<s%> that I may do it to you."'"

So <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H7651>him,<s%> "Shall seven <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to you in your <S%H776>land?<s%> Or will you <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H6862>foes<s%> while they <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H7969>you?<s%> Or shall there be three <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> in your <S%H776>land?<s%> Now <S%H3045>answer,<s%> and <S%H7200>consider<s%> what <S%H1697>answer<s%> I shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to him who sent <S%H7971>me.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> "I am <S%H3966>in<s%> <S%H6887>distress.<s%> Let us <S%H5307>fall<s%> now into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for his <S%H7356>mercies<s%> are <S%H7227>great.<s%> Let me not <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>"

So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> a <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> on <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H1242>morning<s%> even to the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H6256>time;<s%> and there <S%H4191>died<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

When the <S%H4397>angel<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3068>it,<s%> Yahweh <S%H5162>relented<s%> of the <S%H7451>disaster,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "It is <S%H7227>enough.<s%> Now <S%H7503>stay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was by the threshing <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H728>Araunah<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2398>"Behold,<s%> I have sinned, and I have done <S%H5753>perversely;<s%> but these <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> what have they <S%H6213>done?<s%> Please let your <S%H3027>hand<s%> be against <S%H1>me,<s%> and against my father's <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

<S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5927>him,<s%> "Go up, <S%H6965>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> on the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> floor of <S%H728>Araunah<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>"
<S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

<S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H7200>out,<s%> and saw the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> coming <S%H5674>on<s%> toward <S%H728>him.<s%> Then Araunah went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself before the <S%H4428>king<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

<S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why has my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant?<s%>" <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "To <S%H7069>buy<s%> your <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1129>floor,<s%> to build an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that the <S%H4046>plague<s%> may be <S%H6113>stopped<s%> from afflicting the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

<S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> and offer <S%H5927>up<s%> what seems <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H5869>him.<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> the <S%H1241>cattle<s%> for the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the threshing <S%H4173>instruments<s%> and the <S%H3627>yokes<s%> of the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for the <S%H6086>wood:<s%>

all <S%H4428>this,<s%> king, does <S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>" <S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> accept <S%H7521>you.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H728>Araunah,<s%> <S%H7069>"No;<s%> but I will most certainly <S%H7069>buy<s%> it from you for a <S%H4242>price.<s%> I will not <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> which cost me <S%H2600>nothing.<s%>" So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> floor and the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5927>there,<s%> and offered burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H5930>offerings.<s%> So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> for the <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
